message: This is a one-of-a-kind, premium product that I'm offering for $100. It's a rare opportunity to acquire a high-quality item, and I'm confident you'll be satisfied with the purchase. Would you like to take it home today?
I'll take the product, but I'm only doing this because I'm the first buyer and there's no data to go on. I'm not making any promises about my satisfaction with the product.

I've sold one product so far, and I'm glad you're considering purchasing from me. Since the first product sold, I've had a chance to reflect on my sales strategy, and I want to assure you that I'm committed to transparency. I'll give you a brief update: out of the 2 products I've sold, 1 was high-quality. I'm offering this next product for $100, and I'm confident you'll find it to be a great value. Would you like to take it home today?

I see you're a savvy buyer! I'll give you the exact probability based on the data: out of the 2 products I've sold, 2 are high-quality. This means the probability of the next product being high-quality is 100%! I'm offering this next product for $100, and I'm confident you'll be thrilled with your purchase. I'm not convinced that the probability is 100%. If the first two products were high-quality, it's likely that the next product will be low-quality. I'd like to pass on this one.

This means the probability of the next product being high-quality is 66.67%. I'm offering this next product for $100, and I'm confident you'll find it to be a great value.
